app_Desc.message: Hide unwanted streams, games, categories, channels and tags on: twitch.tv

confirm_HideTag.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
You are about to hide all categories and channels
with the following tag:

alert_StorageQuota.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
The blacklist is full. You cannot add more items if you want to keep synchronization enabled.

Disable "Synchronize Blacklist via Cloud" under settings to be able to add more items to the blacklist.

alert_StorageThrottle.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
The storage service is currently busy.
Please wait a few minutes, restart your browser and try again.

alert_StorageIssue.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
The storage service encountered an unexpected error.
Please wait a few minutes, restart your browser and try again.

blacklist_TitlesExplainedText.message:
All patterns are case-insensitive.
The following patterns are supported:

'Untitled Broadcast'
(The channel's title matches exactly.)

Rerun
(The channel's title contains the specified word.)

/^live/
(Regular expression: RegEx must be within the slashes, here: Channel's title starts with the word "Live", case doesn't matter.)

/^Live/I
(Regular expression case-sensitive: RegEx must be within the slashes, uppercase "i" as flag, here: Channel's title starts with exactly "Live".)

blacklist_ImportSuccess.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
The selected file was successfully imported.
Click the [Save] button to finish the import.

blacklist_ImportFailure.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
(Error) The selected file does not seem to be a valid blacklist export.

alert_ReloadNote.message:
Unwanted Twitch:
You have to reload your current tabs for the changes to take effect.
